articles.title: About Issues
articles.subtitle: Use GitHub Issues to track ideas, feedback, tasks, or bugs for work on GitHub.

articles.title: About Projects
articles.subtitle: Projects is an adaptable, flexible tool for planning and tracking work on GitHub.

articles.title: Creating a project
articles.subtitle: Learn how to create an organization or user project.

articles.title: About task lists
articles.subtitle: You can use task lists to break the work for an issue or pull request into smaller tasks, then track the full set of work to completion.

options.title: Ask the community
options.subtitle: Ask questions, swap stories, share ideas on the community forum.

options.title: What's new
options.subtitle: Discover the latest issue updates on our blog

video.title: GitHub Issues: Using Projects for feature planning
video.subtitle: Project planning for developers. Check out a demo on how to use the new Projects experience for planning your next feature.
